title: Versailles no Bara (The Rose of Versailles)
synopsis: In 1755, Marie Antoinette is born in the royal family of Austria and raised in luxury. However, the fate of the future queen of France is set in stone—at the young age of 15, she has to leave her family and marry the crown prince of France.
related_anime: ['Versailles no Bara: Seimei Aru Kagiri Aishite', 'Versailles no Bara', 'Versailles no Bara to Onna-tachi', 'La Rose de Versailles']
